original_text: That night they got their father to drink wine, and the older daughter went in and slept with him. He was not aware of it when she lay down or when she got up.
korean_text: 그 밤에 그들이 아버지에게 술을 마시게 하고 큰 딸이 들어가서 그 아버지와 동침하니라 그러나 그 아버지는 그 딸이 눕고 일어나는 것을 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: That night they got their father to drink wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그날 밤 그들은 아버지에게 포도주를 마시게 했고

sentences.original_text: and the older daughter went in
He was not aware of it
